articles.title: More L.A. restaurants requiring COVID-19 vaccines or tests - Los Angeles Times
articles.description: A growing number of Los Angeles restaurants are requiring that diners be vaccinated against COVID-19 or show proof of a recent negative test.
articles.content:
A growing number of Los Angeles restaurants are requiring that diners be vaccinated against COVID-19 or show proof of a recent negative test.

articles.title: China Doubles Down On Coal Despite Global Push To Go Green - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: While much of the world is racing towards greener energy, coal is exploding in China with higher temperatures leaving the country desperate for electricity
articles.content:
Despite global expectations to move away from coal, demand in China is still strong, as rising global temperatures causing heat waves are driving up electricity demand and coal prices.
